          <title>
            <string language="en">Lagging the water tanks</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verlangsamen die Wasserbehälter</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Traînant les réservoirs d'eau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Retardando-se os tanques de água</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ritardandosi i carri armati dell'acqua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καθυστέρηση των δεξαμενών ύδατος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Retrasándose los tanques de agua</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows water tanks with (left) and without (right) lagging.</string>
          </description>

links) und ohne (rechter) Verzögerung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre des réservoirs d'eau 
avec (à gauche) et sans (le bon) ralentissement.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra os tanques de água com 
(à esquerda) e sem lagging (direito).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra i carri armati 
dell'acqua con (a sinistra) e senza (il giusto) lagging.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει δεξαμενές ύδατος με 
(αριστερά) και χωρίς (δεξιά) μονωτικό περίβλημα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra tanques de agua con (a
